results.title: HYPER/ECHO
results.creator_credit: Andrew Gleeson, Cecile Richard and Firepit Collective
results.brief_description: HYPER/ECHO points to our relationship with technology and the digital world, how brittle and ephemeral – often by design – its infrastructure really is, and to the fundamental human desire to preserve and pass down knowledge, even when buildings crumble down, languages wane, and hyperlinks break.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Andrew Gleeson, Cecile Richard and Firepit Collective
results.description: HYPER/ECHO points to our relationship with technology and the digital world, how brittle and ephemeral – often by design – its infrastructure really is, and to the fundamental human desire to preserve and pass down knowledge, even when buildings crumble down, languages wane, and hyperlinks break.
description_for_label: HYPER/ECHO points to our relationship with technology and the digital world, how brittle and ephemeral – often by design – its infrastructure really is, and to the fundamental human desire to preserve and pass down knowledge, even when buildings crumble down, languages wane, and hyperlinks break.

results.title: Alpine Playground
results.creator_credit: Tourist Development Authority of Victoria and Cinesound
results.brief_description: A holiday with a difference; the joys of an alpine winter holiday in Victoria’s picturesque skiing resorts, Mt Buffalo, Mt Hotham and Falls Creek. Within easy reach of Melbourne, facilities include expert ski instruction, readily available ski tows, toboggans, and comfortable accommodation.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tourist Development Authority of Victoria and Cinesound

results.title: Ossie Ostrich
results.brief_description:
Early prototype of Australia’s most famous ostrich and former Nine Network star from Hey Hey it’s Saturday.
On permanent loan to ACMI.
